Name: Ahal Province
Description: Located in the central part of Turkmenistan, this region is home to the capital city, Ashgabat. It has a mix of desert and mountainous terrain.

Name: Balkan Province
Description: Bordering the Caspian Sea, this region is known for its natural beauty, including beaches and mountains.

Name: Dashoguz Province
Description: Located in the northern part of Turkmenistan, this region has a largely desert landscape and is important for agriculture.

Name: Lebap Province
Description: Located in the eastern part of the country, this province is known for its historical sites, including ancient ruins and the Amu Darya river.

Name: Mary Province
Description: Situated in the southeastern part of Turkmenistan, this region is known for its agriculture, particularly cotton, and historical significance.
